蕯字的基本解释

蕯
sà
“薩”的讹字。

蕯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sà］
［《廣韻》桑割切，入曷，心。］
“萨1”的繁体字。
(1)菩萨。
(2)姓。明有萨琦。见《明史·刘铉传》。

蕯字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蕯； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1059第25
【字彙補】力公切，音隆。人名，步大汗蕯，代郡人，北齊時積封至義陽郡公。

蕯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蕯字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sà］
["Guangyun" Mulberry cuts, enters, heart. ]
Traditional characters for "萨1".
(1) Bodhisattva.
(2) Last name. There is Sachi. See "Ming History·Liu Xuan Biography".
Prosthesis
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Characters] 　蕯; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1059 25
【Word Supplement】Li Gongqie, Yinlong. The name of the person was profusely sweating, and he was a native of the county. During the Northern Qi Dynasty, he was sealed to Yiyang County.
